recipesJson.name: Porch Crawler
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: Okay another entry for the flavor-pro year in mixing week 19 - this one has a serano chili in it but of course I don't have that so I am switching in hibiscus and ginger - then it is rum, lemon, cherries (this is why I picked this one - I love cherry crush), mint, soda and sugar.  My Jamaican rum is from vape wild which I don't see here so put FW.  Maybe I won't get flavors from them again?
